title: Supervisory Policy 2 - Advertisement of Interest Rates on Savings and Time Accounts
content:
Supervisory Policy 2 - Advertisement of Interest Rates on Savings and Time Accounts

State Regulations
§ 2.1 - Advertisement of interest rate achieved through compounding, version 2
§ 2.2 - Advertisement of compounding method, version 2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
